wybug_title: ShopEx某分站数据库等敏感信息泄漏
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-07：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-07：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-17：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-27：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-06：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-06-21：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 总共2处 详细说明：  http://service.shopex.cn/.svn/entries     可以用svn源码泄漏工具查看源代码http://my.shopex.cn/.svn/entries        可以用svn源码泄漏工具查看源代码可以用svn源码泄漏工具查看源代码



http://service.shopex.cn/.svn/entries    敏感信息泄漏于这个网址

数据库信息一览无余：

数据库信息泄漏：
public $shopex_license = array(        'driver' => 'mysql',        'host' => '192.168.0.8',        'login' => 'shopex_certi',        'password' => '_72qrzed5rd7',        'database' => 'shopex_certi'    );    public $shopex_user = array(        'driver' => 'mysql',        'host' => '192.168.0.8',        'login' => 'shopex_user',        'password' => '24A49E05481faU428',        'database' => 'shopex_user'    );    // 官网库    public $shopex_analysis = array(        'driver' => 'mysql',        'host' => '60.191.141.220:60506',        'login' => 'shopex_analysist',        'password' => 'shopex_analysis_tmp_zova',        'database' => 'shopex_analysis'    );    public $collect = array(        'driver' => 'mysql',        'host' => '192.168.0.8',        'login' => 'collect',        'password' => 'collect_zova',        'database' => 'collect'    );    public $shopex_order = array(        'driver' => 'mysql',        'host' => '192.168.0.8',        'login' => 'shopex_order',        'password' => 'pv17aj8zrq8i',        'database' => 'shopex_order'    );    public $shopex_sms_license = array(        'driver' => 'mysql',        'host' => '192.168.0.8',        'login' => 'shopexpe',        'password' => '_72qrzed5rd7',        'database' => 'shopex_sms_license'    );}
尽快修复吧！   漏洞证明：  http://service.shopex.cn/.svn/entries     可以用svn源码泄漏工具查看源代码http://my.shopex.cn/.svn/entries        可以用svn源码泄漏工具查看源代码可以用svn源码泄漏工具查看源代码

数据库信息泄漏：
public $shopex_license = array(        'driver' => 'mysql',        'host' => '192.168.0.8',        'login' => 'shopex_certi',        'password' => '_72qrzed5rd7',        'database' => 'shopex_certi'    );    public $shopex_user = array(        'driver' => 'mysql',        'host' => '192.168.0.8',        'login' => 'shopex_user',        'password' => '24A49E05481faU428',        'database' => 'shopex_user'    );    // 官网库    public $shopex_analysis = array(        'driver' => 'mysql',        'host' => '60.191.141.220:60506',        'login' => 'shopex_analysist',        'password' => 'shopex_analysis_tmp_zova',        'database' => 'shopex_analysis'    );    public $collect = array(        'driver' => 'mysql',        'host' => '192.168.0.8',        'login' => 'collect',        'password' => 'collect_zova',        'database' => 'collect'    );    public $shopex_order = array(        'driver' => 'mysql',        'host' => '192.168.0.8',        'login' => 'shopex_order',        'password' => 'pv17aj8zrq8i',        'database' => 'shopex_order'    );    public $shopex_sms_license = array(        'driver' => 'mysql',        'host' => '192.168.0.8',        'login' => 'shopexpe',        'password' => '_72qrzed5rd7',        'database' => 'shopex_sms_license'    );}

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2015-05-07 14:44 厂商回复： 非常感谢您为shopex信息安全做的贡献我们将尽快修复非常感谢 最新状态： 暂无
